title: Angela Merkel - Wikipedia
snippet: Angela Dorothea Merkel (German pronunciation: [aŋˈɡeːla doʁoˈteːa ˈmɛʁkl̩] ⓘ; née Kasner; born 17 July 1954) is a German retired politician who served as Chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021. She is the only woman to have held the office and the only from former East Germany.

title: Angela Merkel
snippet: Get in TouchGet In Touch With Angela MerkelGet In Touch ... Merkel became the first female Chancellor of Germany in 2005 and is serving her fourth term.

title: Angela Merkel | Book, Biography, Putin, Education, Freedom, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Angela Merkel (born July 17, 1954, Hamburg, West Germany) is a German politician who served as chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021.

title: Angela Merkel governs Germany | 16 years as chancellor
snippet: Saying goodbye to Angela Merkel in pictures: She has governed Germany for almost 16 years, but now Angela Merkel is ending her term in office as chancellor. Take a look at her career in pictures.

title: Angela D Merkel | Archives of Women's Political Communication
snippet: Angela Merkel served as Germany's chancellor from 2005 to 2021 and the leader of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) from 2000 to 2018, the first female to hold either position. Merkel was born in Hamburg on July 17, 1954.
